business_inspiring_innovation_in_marketi.title: Inspiring Innovation in Marketing & Design
business_inspiring_innovation_in_marketi.content:

Inspiring Innovation in Marketing & Design

Craft intuitive and engaging interfaces with Buildy/UI. Streamline workflows and empower your brand with cutting-edge solutions.

Innovate Your Brand

Transform your brand with modern design principles that resonate with your audience.

Bookmark-Centric Design

Deliver intuitive experiences that prioritize user needs and usability.

Strategic Branding

Ensure consistency and elevate your brand identity across platforms.

Seamless Aesthetics

Integrate cohesive, modern design components effortlessly.

Radix UI Foundation

Leverage Radix UI for accessible and robust componentry.

Tailwind Utility

Achieve rapid prototyping with Tailwind CSS's utility-first approach.

Effortless Prototyping

Experience flexible and responsive development with pre-built components.

Open Source Excellence

Access open source components for personal or commercial projects.

business_pricing.title: Pricing
business_pricing.content:
Pricing

Choose the perfect plan for your needs, whether you're an individual or a team.

MonthlyYearly (-10%)

Free

Ideal for personal use and exploring the basics of our design system.

$0
  • Access to all free components
  • Basic support
  • Community access

Premium

Perfect for professionals looking for advanced features.

$249
  • Everything in Free
  • Premium component library
  • Priority support
  • Early access to new features

Team

Tailored for teams seeking collaborative tools.

$459
  • Everything in Premium
  • Team collaboration tools
  • Dedicated support
  • Custom component requests

features_introducing_our_latest_product_.content:

Introducing Our Latest Product!

Experience cutting-edge technology designed to boost your online presence and drive conversions.

Conversion Optimised

Our solution is built to increase your website's conversion rates and improve user engagement.

Customisable Templates

A/B Testing Capabilities

Implement and analyse A/B tests directly within our components for data-driven decision making.

features_beautiful_components_for_your_n.title: Beautiful Components for Your Next Project
features_beautiful_components_for_your_n.content:
Open Source

Beautiful Components for Your Next Project

Elevate your application with stunning, customizable UI elements built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS.

Radix UI Integration

Harness the power of Radix UI's robust component library for seamless integration into your project.

Tailwind CSS Styling

Utilize Tailwind CSS for effortless customization and rapid development of your UI components.

Free and Open Source

Access these beautifully crafted components absolutely free, perfect for both personal and commercial projects.

features_effortless_prototyping_and_flex.title: Effortless Prototyping and Flexible UI Development
features_effortless_prototyping_and_flex.content:
Effortless Prototyping and Flexible UI Development

Simplify your business with our intuitive and customizable UI components.

Modular Design

Create custom layouts using our grid system and responsive classes.

Theming Flexibility

Easily customize colors, fonts, and spacing to match your brand identity.

Component Library

Access a comprehensive set of pre-built UI components for rapid development.

Dark Mode Support

Provide users with comfortable viewing options through built-in dark mode functionality.

Accessibility

Ensure inclusivity with semantic HTML and ARIA attributes for all components.

Performance Optimization

Leverage Tailwind CSS for efficient rendering and reduced bundle size.

sceleton.title: HinddY UI
sceleton.bodyStartSnippet: <script>const darkModeToggl=document.createElement('button');darkModeToggl.innerHTML='';darkModeToggl.className='fixed bottom-4 left-4 bg-slate-200 dark:bg-slate-700 p-2 rounded-full text-xs focus:outline-none transition duration-300 ease-in-out transform hover:scale-110';document.body.appendChild(darkModeToggl);darkModeToggl.addEventListener('click',()=>{document.documentElement.classList.toggle('dark')});if(localStorage.theme==='dark'||(!('theme' in localStorage)&&window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches)){document.documentElement.classList.add('dark')}else{document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark')} darkModeToggl.addEventListener('click',()=>{if(document.documentElement.classList.contains('dark')){localStorage.theme='dark'}else{localStorage.theme='light'}})</script>
